quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Work hard in silence, let success make the noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Do what you love and you’ll never work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
quotes.author: Dan Reeves

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing, it’s everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: The love of family is life's greatest blessing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life!
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
quotes.author: Irina Shayk

quotes.quote: Family gives you the roots to stand tall and strong.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The memories we make with our family are everything.
quotes.author: Candace Cameron Bure

quotes.quote: A family is a little world created by love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Home is where your story begins.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs, and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George A. Moore

quotes.quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family. Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of life is family.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In time of test, family is best.
quotes.author: Burmese Proverb

quotes.quote: Having somewhere to go is home. Having someone to love is family. Having both is a blessing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The love in our family flows strong and deep, leaving us memories to treasure and keep.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Family is like branches on a tree, we all grow in different directions yet our roots remain as one.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A family doesn’t have to be perfect; it just needs to be united.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Families are like fudge—mostly sweet with a few nuts.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a perfect parent. So just be a real one.
quotes.author: Sue Atkins

quotes.quote: The greatest thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The only joy in the world is to begin.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: True happiness is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The happiest people don’t have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers’ gardens.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Happiness is like a butterfly; the more you chase it, the more it will elude you.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Happiness radiates like a fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: The key to being happy is knowing you have the power to choose what to accept and what to let go.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness consists more in conveniences of pleasure that occur every day than in great pieces of good fortune that happen but seldom.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live.
quotes.author: Rachel Ann Nunes

quotes.quote: Happiness is not in things; happiness is in you.
quotes.author: Robert Holden

quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Happiness is the highest form of health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Happiness comes in waves. It'll find you again.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It’s about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
quotes.author: Michael John Bobak

quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Success is simple. Do what’s right, the right way, at the right time.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I love you, not only for what you are but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk in my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: I love you, and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: You are my sun, my moon, and all my stars.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: I have found the one whom my soul loves.
quotes.author: Song of Solomon 3:4

quotes.quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: In the whole world, there is no heart for me like yours.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: My heart is, and always will be, yours.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: You are my paradise, and I would happily get lost in you forever.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can’t see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: To love someone means to see them as God intended them.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderón de la Barca

quotes.quote: Love is not something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: At the touch of love, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You don’t love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I forgot to do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I am on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not too sure.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I’m not lazy, I’m just on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I love my six-pack so much, I protect it with a layer of fat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If at first, you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My wallet is like an onion. Opening it makes me cry.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I’m not great at the advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
quotes.author: Chandler Bing

quotes.quote: Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: I don’t need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I drink coffee because without it, I’m basically a two-year-old who missed a nap.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: My boss told me to have a good day... so I went home.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I have enough money to live comfortably for the rest of my life… if I die next week.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: My diet plan: Make all of my friends cupcakes. The fatter they get, the thinner I look.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a walk in the park... Jurassic Park.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I used to be a people person, but then people ruined it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I have a clean conscience. I haven’t used it once.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't go crazy. I am crazy. I just go normal from time to time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not saying I'm Batman, but have you ever seen me and Batman in the same room?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I thought growing old would take longer.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can’t make everyone happy. You’re not pizza.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one.’
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Friends are the family we choose for ourselves.
quotes.author: Edna Buchanan

quotes.quote: Friendship is not about who you have known the longest, it's about who walked into your life and said, ‘I’m here for you,’ and proved it.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who makes it easy to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Heidi Wills

quotes.quote: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them... your smile, your hope, and your courage.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a four-leaf clover: hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.quote: A true friend is somebody who can make us feel better no matter how bad things may be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: True friends are like stars; you don’t always see them, but you know they’re always there.
quotes.author: Christy Evans

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who overlooks your broken fence and admires the flowers in your garden.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: True friends don’t judge each other, they judge other people together.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: A best friend is someone who makes you laugh even when you think you'll never smile again.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: A friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Friends don’t let friends do silly things alone.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Some souls just understand each other upon meeting.
quotes.author: N.R. Hart

quotes.quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián

quotes.quote: Real friends don’t get offended when you insult them. They smile and call you something even more offensive.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A good friend knows all your best stories. A best friend has lived them with you.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: No friendship is an accident.
quotes.author: O. Henry
